name: gera_mapa_dos_arredores
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool consulta_cnpj_tempo_real.
Tool description: API Tempo Real de Consultas a Receita Federal, Simples Nacional e Cadastro de Contribuintes (SINTEGRA).
API description: Generates a map of the surroundings for a given CNPJ (Brazilian company identifier). This function allows customization of the map through various parameters such as height, zoom, width, scale, and type.

cnpj.description: The CNPJ of the company to generate the map for.

height.description: The height of the map. Defaults to None.

zoom.description: The zoom level of the map. Defaults to None.

width.description: The width of the map. Defaults to None.

scale.description: The scale of the map. Defaults to None.

type.description: The type of the map (e.g., 'hybrid'). Defaults to 'hybrid'.
